Interface Dimension.RelativeDimensionBase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    Enclosing class:
    Dimension

    public static interface Dimension.RelativeDimensionBase

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default double getCh()
      The length of a 'ch', in millimeters
      default double getEm()
      The length of a 'em', in millimeters
      default double getViewportHeight()
      The height of the viewport, in millimeters Used to convert to and from vh.
      default double getViewportWidth()
      The width of the viewport, in millimeters Used to convert to and from vw.
